/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The intersection is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way around. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the background, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
